issue.title: [Doc] Indicate location of archery
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14295](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14295). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Update <https://arrow.apache.org/docs/developers/archery.html#archery> to indicate where archery is located so that one knows where to run `pip install -e dev/archery` from.
